    • vertex

      public V vertex(Predicate<V> p)
      Description copied from interface: Graph
      Find the first vertex for which Predicate is true. An example to get the Person vertex with a particular name: 
            Graphinvalid input: '<'Person, Integer> g = new ...;
      g.vertex( p -> p.getName().equals(name) );
      Specified by:
      vertex in interface Graph<V,E>
      Parameters:
      p - predicate (should be given in lambda form)
      Returns:
      the first vertex for which predicate p is true, null if not found
